title: Blessing Previews God of War Ragnarok -  Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.21.22
description:
God of War Ragnarok previews have dropped and Blessing missed out on PS I Love You XOXO so let's hear his thoughts! Also let's talk with Bless and Tim about Resident Evil 4 and Pokemon Scarlet and Violet.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
Our God of War Ragnarok is up right now as a new episode of PS I Love You XOXO. That’s up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
After today's episode of KFGD, Greg is living his dream and busting ghosts in Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed! Come see him turn Mike into his spiritual partner and see if Gruesome Greggy can live the dream and Platinum the game in a series of sponsored streams! If you miss it live, catch the archive on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer:
Fargo Brady on YouTube
The Roper Report  -
00:05:12 - God of War preview Round Up
00:14:47 - Resident Evil 4 Preview round up
00:22:28 - Pokémon Scarlet and Violet's NPCs are getting a big change - Casey DeFreitas @ IGN
00:31:08 - Ad
00:35:12 -Platinum publicly backs Bayonetta’s new voice actor - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:38:36 - Pilotwings 64's New Frame Rate Is Breaking the Game - Ryan Leston @ IGN
00:44:10 - Out today
00:57:22 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Monday: Greg & Tim
Tuesday: Bless & Tim
Wednesday: Bless & Greg
Thursday: Bless & Tim
Friday: Tim & Bless
